subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The transformation of a major doping investigation involving Ivan Basso from a doomsday event for cycling into merely an unpleasant memory is largely a result of conflicts between criminal and doping investigations.
snippet: The transformation of a major doping investigation involving Ivan Basso from a doomsday event for cycling into merely an unpleasant memory is largely a result of conflicts between criminal and doping investigations.
